original: “Tatra, poṭṭhapāda, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evamāhaṁsu:
analyzed: tatra poṭṭhapāda ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ
corrected: tatra poṭṭhapāda ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇā evamāhaṁsu

original: Samādhijapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā tasmiṁ samaye hoti, samādhijapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññīyeva tasmiṁ samaye hoti.
analyzed: tasmin samaye hoti samādhi ja pīti sukha sukhuma sacca saññīyā iva tasmin samaye hoti
corrected: Samādhi ja pīti sukha sukhuma sacca saññā tasmiṁ samaye hoti samādhi ja pīti sukha sukhuma sacca saññīyeva tasmiṁ samaye hoti

original: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā;
analyzed: na iva hoti na na hoti tathāgataḥ param vā
corrected: na eva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā ti vā

original: “tadā maṁ, bhante, te paribbājakā acirapakkantassa bhagavato samantato vācāsannitodakena sañjhabbharimakaṁsu:

corrected: tadā maṁ bhante te paribbājakā acira pakkantassa bhagavato samantato vācā sannitodakena sañjhabbharimakaṁsu

original: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti vā;
analyzed: na iva hoti na na hoti tathāgataḥ param vā
corrected: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā ti vā

original: ‘ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo paraṁ maraṇā’ti.
analyzed: ekanta sukhī attā hoti arogaḥ param
corrected: ekanta sukhī attā hoti arogo paraṁ maraṇā ti

original: ‘ayaṁ vā so, āvuso, oḷāriko attapaṭilābho, yassa mayaṁ pahānāya dhammaṁ desema, yathāpaṭipannānaṁ
analyzed: ayam vā saḥ āvuso oḷārikaḥ atta paṭilābhaḥ yassa mayam pahānāya dhammam desema
corrected: ayam vā so āvuso oḷāriko atta paṭilābho yassa mayam pahānāya dhammam desema yathāpaṭipannānam

original: ‘ayaṁ vā so, āvuso, manomayo attapaṭilābho yassa mayaṁ pahānāya dhammaṁ desema, yathāpaṭipannānaṁ

corrected: oḷārikaḥ attapaṭilābho tveva tasmin samaye saṅkham gacchati

original: atthāhaṁ etarahi, nāhaṁ natthī’ti.

original: Oḷāriko attapaṭilābhotveva tasmiṁ samaye saṅkhaṁ gacchati.

corrected: oḷārikaḥ attapaṭilābho tveva tasmin samaye saṅkham gacchati

corrected: arūpo attapaṭilābho tveva tasmin samaye saṅkham gacchati

original: arūpo attapaṭilābhotveva tasmiṁ samaye saṅkhaṁ gacchati.

original: pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ

corrected: pahitattaḥ viharantaḥ na cirasseva yassa atthāya kula puttā sammad eva agārasma anagāriya

original: “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthAttāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati
corrected: khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariyam katam karaṇīyam na aparam itthattāya ti abbhaññāsi
